examples.example: 每天午睡一会儿能让我下午精力更加充沛。

translate.english: Taking a nap every day can make me more energetic in the afternoon.

examples.example: 我养成了午睡的好习惯，感觉每天都充满活力。

translate.english: I have developed a good habit of taking a nap at noon and feel full of energy every day.

examples.example: 我每天都会进行午睡，这样能让我以更好的状态迎接下午的工作和生活。

translate.english: I take a nap every day, so that I can meet the work and life in the afternoon in a better state.
